trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa una entrada de audio asociada a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" />.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Un reconocedor de voz genera información acerca de la entrada de audio como parte de la operación de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener acceso el audio reconocido, utilice la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> propiedad o el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> método de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes:
trans-unit.target: Se puede producir un resultado de reconocimiento de los siguientes eventos y los métodos de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> clases:

trans-unit.source: Events:
trans-unit.target: Eventos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Methods:
trans-unit.target: Métodos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Un resultado de reconocimiento generado por el reconocimiento de voz emulado no contiene audio reconocido.

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Para este tipo de resultados de reconocimiento, su <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> propiedad devuelve `null` y su <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> método produce una excepción.

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca del reconocimiento de voz emulados, consulte el `EmulateRecognize` y `EmulateRecognizeAsync` métodos de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> clases.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se controla el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos y salidas a la información de la consola sobre el audio reconocido que está asociado con el resultado del reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la ubicación en el flujo de audio de entrada para el inicio del sonido reconocido.

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: La ubicación en el flujo de audio de entrada para el inicio del audio reconocido.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad hace referencia a la posición al principio de la frase reconocida en secuencia de audio generado del dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Por el contrario, el `RecognizerAudioPosition` propiedad de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> posición del reconocedor dentro de su entrada de audio hacen referencia a las clases.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Estas posiciones pueden ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [mediante eventos de reconocimiento de voz](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> propiedad obtiene la hora del sistema en el inicio de la operación de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se controla el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos y salidas a la información de la consola sobre el audio reconocido que está asociado con el resultado del reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la duración de la secuencia de audio de entrada para el audio reconocido.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: La duración de la secuencia de audio de entrada para el audio reconocido.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se controla el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos y salidas a la información de la consola sobre el audio reconocido que está asociado con el resultado del reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el formato de sonido procesado por un motor de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: El formato del audio procesado por el módulo de reconocimiento de voz.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se controla el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos y salidas a la información de la consola sobre el audio reconocido que está asociado con el resultado del reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: El punto inicial de los datos de audio que se van a devolver.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Longitud del segmento que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Selecciona y devuelve una sección del audio reconocido actual como datos binarios.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una subsección del audio reconocido, tal como lo definen <paramref name="audioPosition" /> y <paramref name="duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea una gramática de reconocimiento de voz para la entrada de nombre, se agrega un controlador para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> eventos y carga la gramática en un reconocedor de voz en curso.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, escribe la información de audio para la parte del nombre de la entrada a un archivo de audio.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: El archivo de audio se utiliza como entrada para un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto, que habla una frase que incluye el audio grabado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" /> define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> y <paramref name="duration" /> definen un segmento de audio fuera del intervalo del segmento actual.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: El audio reconocido actual no contiene datos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la hora del sistema al principio de la operación de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: La hora del sistema al principio de la operación de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> propiedad obtiene la hora del sistema en el inicio de la operación de reconocimiento, que puede ser útil para los cálculos de latencia y rendimiento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> propiedad obtiene la ubicación en la secuencia de audio generado del dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se controla el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos y salidas a la información de la consola sobre el audio reconocido que está asociado con el resultado del reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Flujo que recibirán los datos de audio.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Escribe todo el audio en un flujo como datos sin formato.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Datos de audio se escriben en `outputStream` en formato binario.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Se incluye ninguna información de encabezado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> método utiliza el formato de onda, pero no incluye el encabezado de onda.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para incluir el encabezado de onda, use la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Flujo que recibirán los datos de audio.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Escribe audio en un flujo en formato de onda.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Datos de audio se escriben en `outputStream` en formato de onda, que incluye un encabezado de recursos interchange file format (RIFF).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> método usa el mismo formato binario, pero no incluye el encabezado de onda.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea una gramática de reconocimiento de voz para la entrada de nombre, se agrega un controlador para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> eventos y carga la gramática en un reconocedor de voz en curso.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, escribe la información de audio para la parte del nombre de la entrada a un archivo de audio.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: El archivo de audio se utiliza como entrada para un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto, que habla una frase que incluye el audio grabado.
